attributes.action: change the system of daylight saving in order to give England lighter nights both in the summer and the winter.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition urges the Government to revert to a system, proposed earlier this year by the Local Government Association, whereby winter is GMT +1, equivalent to British Summer Time, and summer is GMT +2.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "change the system of daylight saving in order to give England lighter nights both in the summer and the winter."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13998.asp
